text: Nudžein Geca (born 10 May 1966) is a retired Bosnian-Herzegovinian and Yugoslav professional footballer. Geca started his senior professional career as a 16 year old with Radnički Goražde. In the summer of 1988 he was transferred to Yugoslav First League side FK Sarajevo, whom he represented until 1995. He further played for Bosna Visoko and Željezničar, before retiring in 2003. He earned six caps for Bosnia and Herzegovina. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Yugoslav footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:FK Sarajevo players Category:Yugoslav First League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Sarajevo Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina international footballers
title: Nudžein Geca
